placeholders.game_session_name: Enter a compelling name for your planned game session
placeholders.search_and_select_game_system: Search and select the game system you want to use
placeholders.safety_tool_details: Any specifics about the chosen safety tool
placeholders.player_boundaries_consent: Any boundaries or consent notes players should be aware of
placeholders.search_users: Search by name or email (4+ chars)

descriptions.session_overview: Share the essentials players need before they RSVP.
descriptions.participant_requirements: Optional guidelines that help players self-select into the right tables.
descriptions.location: Let players know where the session will take place.
descriptions.safety_table_culture: Optional expectations that set the tone for how you'll play together.
descriptions.invite_participants: Search for users or invite them by email.
descriptions.game_invitation: You have been invited to this game. Please accept or reject the invitation.

visibility_options.description: Visibility options: Public (visible to everyone), Connections & Teammates (visible to your followers, the people you follow, and active teammates), Private (visible only to invited players)

confirmation.cancel_session: Are you sure you want to cancel this session?

validation_errors.game_session_name_required: The game session name is what most players see first when looking for adventure, make sure it's compelling.
validation_errors.description_required: Please add a game session description that sets the tone for what players should expect.
validation_errors.game_system_required: Please select a game system for your session.
validation_errors.duration_required: Enter a game duration in minutes to let others know how much time to reserve for this.
validation_errors.price_optional: If you want to add a cover charge for the game, specify it here.
validation_errors.language_required: Choose the language that the game system you chose will be played in.
validation_errors.visibility_required: Pick a visibility value that allows you to find the right people efficiently.
validation_errors.min_players_required: We need to know how many people are expected to participate.
validation_errors.max_players_required: We need to know how many people are expected to participate.
validation_errors.address_required: Enter the address of the location where the game session will take place.

combobox.empty_message: Start typing the name of the game system to search.

review_labels.placeholder_comment: What stood out in this session?
